about_the_game:
"

Earthshaker Fantasy Adventure


Terror has struck the town of Ludford: During the night, something massive crushed the village into splinters and scattered the survivors. The baron needs the heroes to assist his ragtag band of soldiers in tracking down what could have wreaked such carnage.
"
